ej,suzui001,P,rungb901,Called strike three (drew line in dirt) $after the third strike, Mariners right fielder Ichiro Suzuki drew a line with his bat near the chalk line of the batter's box on the outside of the plate, telling HP umpire Brian Runge that's where Ichiro thought the pitch was; he was ejected by Runge, the first ejection for the Mariners in 2009 and the first in Ichiro's career
